channel.title: How can i make a clan wars whit Delta basic?
channel.description: I use deltascape basic can i make a kind of a clan wars (fun pk) So like i add 2 global objeckts The portals, and then make a area fun pk. and link the portal to funpk? is there a way? please help( i mean if i go in a portal i come to a place whit fun pk, so how can i make that ?) plz help

item.title: How can i make a clan wars whit Delta basic?
item.dc:creator: @RuneScapeWPS RuneScapeWPS
item.description:
@RuneScapeWPS wrote:

Oh em gee this could be awesome and actually easy to do. I can’t tell you how to do it, but I can give you some pointers/steps.

1.) Get a NPC and give it some sendMsg’s that gives a tut to play Clan Wars
2.) Put it in autospawn
3.) make the portal with the certain object ID teleport you to one side of the Built clan wars.
4.) make the othher portal teleport you to the otherside. you can do this with client.java and object.cfg
5.) Build it!, make it nasty with like stone walls around it
6.) About the 1 minute timer, you can do it in client.java but itd be really really hard.

If you get it working, please post some pics, thatd be sweet

Read full topic
item.source: How can i make a clan wars whit Delta basic?
